channel.title: Comments on: How To Look Great in Photos

item.title: By: Rosa Muziotti
item.dc:creator: Rosa Muziotti
item.description: Thank you. I understood why some photos are nicer than others. By the way, photographer only show your natural beauty because your photos are not "photoshopped", are they?
item.content:encoded: Thank you. I understood why some photos are nicer than others. By the way, photographer only show your natural beauty because your photos are not “photoshopped”, are they?

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Thank you so much, Beth! We're all elevating each other. :)
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much, Beth! We’re all elevating each other. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Hi Tina! Yes, people get tripped up by this ESPECIALLY when they are watching themselves on the screen. If you're looking at the screen instead of the camera, people think you come off as shifty cause you're not meeting their eyes.
item.content:encoded: Hi Tina! Yes, people get tripped up by this ESPECIALLY when they are watching themselves on the screen. If you’re looking at the screen instead of the camera, people think you come off as shifty cause you’re not meeting their eyes.

item.title: By: Beth
item.dc:creator: Beth
item.description: Thank you Sabrina! You and Tristan have been such a gift to become connected with and learn from. Great suggestions that really work and helped me gain the confidence and expertise to enhance my lighting for my FB Live. Your training was fun, transformative, and the information is useful on a weekly basis!
item.content:encoded: Thank you Sabrina! You and Tristan have been such a gift to become connected with and learn from. Great suggestions that really work and helped me gain the confidence and expertise to enhance my lighting for my FB Live. Your training was fun, transformative, and the information is useful on a weekly basis!

item.title: By: Tina
item.dc:creator: Tina
item.description: Thank You Sabrina for the great tips! Things I would have never thought of! Especially where to look when taking the pictures. <3
item.content:encoded: Thank You Sabrina for the great tips! Things I would have never thought of! Especially where to look when taking the pictures. <3

item.title: By: Sabrina Truscott
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Truscott
item.description: Hi Steve, Definitely try out these tips and let me know what you think :) They're so simple but JUST keeping these in mind make a world of difference.
item.content:encoded: Hi Steve, Definitely try out these tips and let me know what you think ðŸ™‚ They’re so simple but JUST keeping these in mind make a world of difference.

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: Thanks for the tips I have never been happy with my pictures .
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the tips I have never been happy with my pictures .
